name: Bulbasaur
description: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this POKEMON.

name: Ivysaur
description: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.

name: Venusaur
description: The plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.

name: Charmander
description: Obviously prefers hot places. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.

name: Charmeleon
description: When it swings its burning tail, it elevates the temperature to unbearably high levels.

name: Charizard
description: Spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. Known to cause forest fires unintentionally.

name: Squirtle
description: After birth, its back swells and hardens into a shell. Powerfully sprays foam from its mouth.

name: Wartortle
description: Often hides in water to stalk unwary prey. For swimming fast, it moves its ears to maintain balance.

name: Blastoise
description: A brutal POKEMON with pressurized water jets on its shell. They are used for high speed tackles.

name: Caterpie
description: Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.

name: Metapod
description: This Pokémon is vulnerable to attack while its shell is soft, even though it doesn't move much.

name: Butterfree
description: In battle, it flaps its wings at high speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.

name: Weedle
description: Often found in forests, it hides from predators by camouflaging with leaves.

name: Kakuna
description: Its hard shell protects it until it evolves into a more agile and dangerous form.

name: Beedrill
description: It can rush at 45 miles per hour, then sting its enemy repeatedly.

name: Pidgey
description: A common sight in forests and woods; it flutters its wings at high speed.

name: Pidgeotto
description: Very protective of its sprawling territory, it will fiercely peck at any intruder.

name: Pidgeot
description: When hunting, it keeps its eyes on its target and flies at incredible speeds.

name: Rattata
description: Its continuously growing incisors are a constant nuisance to people and Pokémon alike.

name: Raticate
description: Bigger and stronger than Rattata, it uses its sharp fangs to fiercely defend its territory.

name: Spearow
description: Always wary, it flies around in search of any sign of danger.

name: Fearow
description: With its long neck and sharp beak, it can reach its prey even in the highest trees.

name: Ekans
description: It can freely detach its jaw to swallow prey larger than itself.

name: Arbok
description: Its intimidating pattern on its belly is meant to scare foes and warn them to stay away.

name: Pikachu
description: It keeps its tail raised to monitor its surroundings and releases electric charges when threatened.

name: Raichu
description: When several Raichu gather, their electric pouches charge up, making them a dangerous force.

name: Sandshrew
description: It burrows and hides in the desert, making it hard for predators to notice its presence.

name: Sandslash
description: Its fur bristles as it prepares to strike, using its sharp claws to excavate at high speed.

name: Nidoran F
description: It has a timid nature, but its horns grow steadily as it matures into a fierce fighter.

name: Nidorina
description: More courageous than Nidoran F, it is known to take on larger opponents in battle.

name: Nidoqueen
description: Powerfully built, it can withstand harsh attacks while using its massive bulk to deliver crushing blows.

name: Nidoran M
description: While smaller than its female counterpart, it has an aggressive streak and sharp horns.

name: Nidorino
description: Quick to anger, it uses its pointed horns to challenge foes much larger than itself.

name: Nidoking
description: A fierce, powerful Pokémon, it is known to trample anything that stands in its path.

name: Clefairy
description: It is rarely seen in the wild, preferring the solitude of moonlit areas and quiet nights.

name: Clefable
description: Known for its kindness, it is said that Clefable shares its touch to bring luck to those it meets.

name: Vulpix
description: Curls up its multiple tails when resting; its body burns with an inner flame.

name: Ninetales
description: Legendary for its beauty and long lifespan, its tails are said to hold mystical powers.

name: Jigglypuff
description: Its melodious voice can lull even the staunchest fighter to sleep.

name: Wigglytuff
description: It uses its soft, balloon-like body to cushion its fall and soak up attacks.

name: Zubat
description: Constantly buzzing, it is adept at navigating in dark caves using echolocation.

name: Golbat
description: It flies in search of prey, its large mouth capable of delivering a draining bite.

name: Oddish
description: It spends the daytime buried in soil, emerging at night to absorb moonlight.

name: Gloom
description: A strong aroma emanates from its drooping petals, attracting both friends and foes.

name: Vileplume
description: Its large, smelly flower releases toxic pollen that can incapacitate its enemies.

name: Paras
description: Lurking in damp places, it attaches to trees and absorbs nutrients via its mushroom spores.

name: Parasect
description: Its mushroom, now grown large, controls its actions and makes it a slow but dangerous foe.

name: Venonat
description: Shrouded in a thick coat of fur, this Pokémon relies on its keen senses more than sight.

name: Venomoth
description: This moth-like Pokémon flutters silently at night, releasing a toxic dust from its wings.

name: Diglett
description: Lives underground where it carves intricate tunnels; rarely seen above the surface.

name: Dugtrio
description: A trio of Digletts that often appear together, working in unison underground.

name: Meowth
description: It loves coins and will often do bizarre things to get the attention of its trainer.

name: Persian
description: Sleek and refined, this feline prowls quietly and moves with catlike grace.

name: Psyduck
description: Often seen with a puzzled look, this Pokémon suddenly uses powerful psychic moves.

name: Golduck
description: An adept swimmer that uses its psychic powers to confound foes and control water flow.

name: Mankey
description: Always ready for battle, this feisty Pokémon attacks with a flurry of punches.

name: Primeape
description: Its temper is as fierce as its strength; it will relentlessly pursue its target.

name: Growlithe
description: Loyal to a fault, it will bravely defend its trainer from any threat.

name: Arcanine
description: Its majestic appearance belies its ferocious nature in battle.

name: Poliwag
description: A tadpole-like Pokémon known for the spiral pattern on its belly.

name: Poliwhirl
description: Swirling rapidly in water, it can be hard to pinpoint by sight.

name: Poliwrath
description: This muscular Pokémon combines its water abilities with formidable fighting moves.

name: Abra
description: Prefers to sleep most of the time; it teleports away before opponents can react.

name: Kadabra
description: Its psychic powers have grown stronger; it constantly emits a mysterious aura.

name: Alakazam
description: With an extremely high IQ, its psychic capabilities are among the strongest known.

name: Machop
description: This Pokémon trains constantly to increase its already impressive strength.

name: Machoke
description: Known for its physical power, it often proves its strength in intense battles.

name: Machamp
description: This Pokémon uses its four powerful arms to deliver a devastating flurry of blows.

name: Bellsprout
description: A carnivorous Pokémon that traps its prey with a vine whip and then devours it.

name: Weepinbell
description: Swings its vine-like tentacles with surprising speed to ensnare targets.

name: Victreebel
description: Lures prey with a sweet aroma before rapidly snapping it up with its large jaws.

name: Tentacool
description: Drifting through the waves, its tentacles carry a potent toxin capable of paralyzing foes.

name: Tentacruel
description: With its long tentacles and multiple eyes, it simultaneously attacks from every angle.

name: Geodude
description: Often found in mountainous regions, it uses its rocky body to block attacks.

name: Graveler
description: When two Graveler come together, they can roll downhill to create a massive boulder.

name: Golem
description: A behemoth encased in a rugged exterior that cushions every impact it receives.

name: Ponyta
description: This gentle Pokémon runs freely, leaving a blazing trail in its swift wake.

name: Rapidash
description: Its hooves blaze as it charges; few can keep pace with its dazzling speed.

name: Slowpoke
description: Known for its slow nature, it’s often caught napping even in the midst of battle.

name: Slowbro
description: Its evolved shell houses a large Shellder, and together they form a nearly unyielding defense.

name: Magnemite
description: Floating by generating powerful magnetic fields, it absorbs metal particles from the air.

name: Magneton
description: Comprised of three Magnemite joined by magnetic forces, it is a high-powered electromagnet.

name: Farfetch'd
description: Often seen carrying a leek, it is as nimble in battle as it is in foraging for food.

name: Doduo
description: A flightless Pokémon that runs at high speeds, compensating with its powerful legs.

name: Dodrio
description: With three heads working in perfect unison, it overwhelms its prey before they realize.

name: Seel
description: This Pokémon is well-adapted to life in polar regions, using its thick hide to insulate.

name: Dewgong
description: A graceful swimmer, it uses its curved tusks to break through ice in icy waters.

name: Grimer
description: Born from sludge at polluting sites, its toxic body is as dangerous as it is resilient.

name: Muk
description: Its amorphous body is covered in sludge that can poison anything it touches.

name: Shellder
description: This bivalve Pokémon uses its hard shell to protect itself from predators in the ocean.

name: Cloyster
description: Its armored shell is nearly impenetrable, and its sharp spikes can be launched in battle.

name: Gastly
description: A gaseous Pokémon that can envelop its target in a chilling and toxic embrace.

name: Haunter
description: Known for its eerie presence, it drifts silently and casts a menacing shadow.

name: Gengar
description: Often lurking in the shadows, it uses its eerie grin to foil the hearts of its foes.

name: Onix
description: This behemoth dwells underground, using its rock-hard body to tunnel through solid stone.

name: Drowzee
description: It feeds on the dreams of sleeping people, and its eyes reflect eerie patterns.

name: Hypno
description: With a swinging pendulum, it lures and hypnotizes those who gaze into its eyes.

name: Krabby
description: A crab-like Pokémon that snaps its pincers to defend itself and capture prey.

name: Kingler
description: Its oversized claw swings with tremendous force, making it a fearsome opponent.

name: Voltorb
description: Its body resembles a Poké Ball, and it crackles with static electricity.

name: Electrode
description: Explosive by nature, its volatile body stores dangerous amounts of electrical energy.

name: Exeggcute
description: This cluster of eggs works in unison, its many eyes spotting even the slightest movement.

name: Exeggutor
description: Its head resembles a giant coconut, and it uses its psychic power to control plant life.

name: Cubone
description: Wears the skull of its deceased mother, its loneliness fueling its determination.

name: Marowak
description: A more mature form of Cubone, it wields its bone club with great expertise.

name: Hitmonlee
description: Renowned for its powerful legs, it can deliver an array of swift and strong kicks.

name: Hitmonchan
description: It channels its fist techniques into rapid punches, each hit packing a surprising force.

name: Lickitung
description: Noted for its extremely long tongue, it uses its flexible appendage to explore and capture prey.

name: Koffing
description: It stores various gases in its body, which can evolve into lethal toxins if mixed.

name: Weezing
description: Often floating in polluted areas, its body emits toxic fumes that can overwhelm opponents.

name: Rhyhorn
description: Its rugged exterior is nearly impervious to attacks, though its momentum can be slowed by water.

name: Rhydon
description: A tough, rock-skinned Pokémon that defends its territory with massive, crushing force.

name: Chansey
description: Esteemed for its healing qualities, it nurtures the injured with its gentle nature.

name: Tangela
description: Entangled in a mass of vines, it uses its plant-like body to both trap and protect itself.

name: Kangaskhan
description: A caring Pokémon, it guards its young fiercely and has enormous strength when provoked.

name: Horsea
description: Sleek and agile, it maneuvers effortlessly underwater while exhaling a mysterious mist.

name: Seadra
description: Its tail and fins are as graceful as they are strong, propelling it swiftly through the sea.

name: Goldeen
description: Beautiful in appearance, it uses its elegant fins to dart quickly in streams and ponds.

name: Seaking
description: A determined swimmer that uses its hardened scales and sharp horn to fend off attackers.

name: Staryu
description: Its star-shaped body can regenerate lost arms; it navigates by using a mysterious core.

name: Starmie
description: A brilliant core radiates psychic energy, guiding its every move in battle.

name: Mr. Mime
description: Its miming abilities are so convincing that foes often become mesmerized into inaction.

name: Scyther
description: A fearsome predator, it moves with lightning speed and slashes its foes with razor-like arms.

name: Jynx
description: Entrancing with its dancing moves, it uses chilling kisses to freeze its victims.

name: Electabuzz
description: Crackling with energy, it discharges electric shocks that can stun even the toughest opponents.

name: Magmar
description: Its body temperature exceeds that of molten rock; even a simple touch can cause burns.

name: Pinsir
description: It uses its massive pincers for slashing; its grip is known to be incredibly powerful.

name: Tauros
description: A wild and aggressive Pokémon, it charges with unstoppable force when provoked.

name: Magikarp
description: Infamously weak and known for its splash, it has the potential for mighty transformation.

name: Gyarados
description: Once docile, its fury is legendary; it unleashes torrents of water and devastating bites.

name: Lapras
description: Gentle and intelligent, it often carries people across the water while singing enchanting songs.

name: Ditto
description: Capable of transforming into any other Pokémon, its unique ability is as mysterious as it is rare.

name: Eevee
description: Its unstable genetic makeup allows it to evolve in multiple ways under certain conditions.

name: Vaporeon
description: Genetically evolved from Eevee using a water stone, it can melt even the hardest obstacles.

name: Jolteon
description: Bursting with volatile energy, it can launch lightning-fast strikes at its foes.

name: Flareon
description: Its body temperature can reach levels rivaling the sun; a close-range encounter can be devastating.

name: Porygon
description: A man-made Pokémon that exists entirely in cyberspace; its digital nature perplexes researchers.

name: Omanyte
description: A prehistoric Pokémon revived from fossil, it clings to life with its spiral shell.

name: Omastar
description: Evolved from Omanyte, its tentacles and hard shell make it a formidable underwater opponent.

name: Kabuto
description: An ancient Pokémon recovered from fossils, its hard exterior hides surprising agility.

name: Kabutops
description: Evolved from Kabuto, it slashes its foes with its sharp claws and scythe-like arms.

name: Aerodactyl
description: A ferocious, prehistoric Pokémon, it soars through the skies with razor-sharp precision.

name: Snorlax
description: Famed for its enormous size and insatiable appetite, it sleeps through nearly everything.

name: Articuno
description: A legendary bird whose frosty wings can freeze anything; its cry sends shivers down spines.

name: Zapdos
description: This legendary bird crackles with electricity, striking with bolts that illuminate the sky.

name: Moltres
description: A majestic and rare bird, its burning wings leave trails of fire in its flight.

name: Dratini
description: A serpentine Pokémon that dwells in deep waters; its evolution is a rare and coveted treasure.

name: Dragonair
description: Elegant and graceful, it exudes a mystical aura as it glides through the water.

name: Dragonite
description: Benevolent yet powerful, this Pokémon can traverse oceans and continents with ease.

name: Mewtwo
description: An artificially created Pokémon of unparalleled power, its psychic prowess is feared worldwide.

name: Mew
description: A rare and elusive Pokémon, it is said to hold the genetic codes that hold the secrets of all Pokémon.
